channel.title: Comments on: Dovid Sears review of Yoel Glick- Part I
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: pinchas
item.dc:creator: pinchas
item.description: I was always puzzled by the introduction of the ramban in peirush al hatorah where he says the 49 levels of understanding are of the creation and not of the Torah but that seems to reflect many of the above thoughts anyway
item.content:encoded: I was always puzzled by the introduction of the ramban in peirush al hatorah where he says the 49 levels of understanding are of the creation and not of the Torah but that seems to reflect many of the above thoughts anyway

item.title: By: Jonathan
item.dc:creator: Jonathan
item.description: Your ability to show a wide array of parallel teachings from Judaism shows how broad Judaism is and those who seek wisdom in the East should look at their own religion first . How much of an impact do you think this book will have ?
item.content:encoded: Your ability to show a wide array of parallel teachings from Judaism shows how broad Judaism is and those who seek wisdom in the East should look at their own religion first . How much of an impact do you think this book will have ?
